mapper.select: SELECT ROLE_NAME FROM t_sys_role_info where DEL = 1 and ROLE_ID =#{rid}

SELECT t1.date_str,-- 日期 IFNULL(t2.merchantNumber, 0) AS merchantNumber,-- 用户户数量 IFNULL(t3.topUpAmount, 0) AS topUpAmount,-- 充值金额 IFNULL(t4.countNumber, 0) AS countNumber,-- 订单数量 IFNULL(t4.successNumber, 0) AS successNumber,-- 订单成功数量 IFNULL(t4.orderAmount, 0) AS orderAmount,-- 订单金额 IFNULL(t4.successAmount, 0) AS successAmount,-- 成功订单金额 IFNULL(t4.payAmount, 0) AS payAmount -- 手续费 FROM ( SELECT #{endTime, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AS date_str UNION ALL SELECT DATE_SUB(#{endTime, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INTERVAL 1 DAY ) AS date_str UNION ALL SELECT DATE_SUB(#{endTime, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INTERVAL 2 DAY ) AS date_str UNION ALL SELECT DATE_SUB(#{endTime, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INTERVAL 3 DAY ) AS date_str UNION ALL SELECT DATE_SUB(#{endTime, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INTERVAL 4 DAY ) AS date_str UNION ALL SELECT DATE_SUB(#{endTime, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INTERVAL 5 DAY ) AS date_str UNION ALL SELECT DATE_SUB(#{endTime, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INTERVAL 6 DAY ) AS date_str ) t1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT CONVERT (a.ADD_DATE, DATE) AS date_str, COUNT(*) AS merchantNumber -- 用户数量 FROM t_user_info a WHERE a.USER_TYPE = 1 AND a.DEL = 1 GROUP BY CONVERT(a.ADD_DATE, DATE) ) t2 ON t1.date_str = t2.date_str LEFT JOIN ( SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN u.CASH_TYPE = (1) THEN u.CASH_MONEY ELSE 0 END) AS topUpAmount,-- 充值金额 CONVERT(u.ADD_DATE, DATE) AS date_str FROM t_cash_out_in u WHERE u.DEL = 1 GROUP BY CONVERT(u.ADD_DATE, DATE) ) t3 ON t1.date_str = t3.date_str LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(t.ORDER_ID) AS countNumber,-- 订单数量 SUM(CASE WHEN t.ORDER_STATUS = (2) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS successNumber,-- 订单成功数量 SUM(t.ORDER_AMOUNT) AS orderAmount,-- 订单金额 SUM(SUB_MONEY) AS successAmount,-- 盈亏金额 SUM(ORDER_CHARGE) AS payAmount,-- 手续费 CONVERT(t.ADD_DATE, DATE) AS date_str FROM t_order_info t WHERE t.DEL = 1 GROUP BY (CONVERT(t.ADD_DATE, DATE)) ) t4 ON t1.date_str = t4.date_str ORDER BY t1.date_str ASC;
